transArray.content: Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and taking the time to share your stay experience with us. It is our honor to have a clean and comfortable stay. As you said, the hotel is located in the Badali Automobile Park on the West Fourth Ring Road, 10 minutes' walk from the subway. It only takes a five-minute walk to Haidian Wuluju Station on Line 6. Public transportation is accessible in all directions and travel is convenient. Thank you for your support and recognition, which makes all our staff at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel confident on the road ahead. We look forward to working with you. Every encounter! I wish you all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
